projects.name: AeroTycoon: Let's get nasty! (Canceled)
projects.blurb: AeroTycoon is an online multi-player tycoon game where your goal is to become #1 & to humiliate your friends. Seriously, make them cry.

projects.name: Game Infirmary is an in depth guide book into 3D shooters.
projects.blurb: Game Infirmary is an in depth guide book into First and Third-Person Shooters. This book is for both beginners and veterans.

projects.name: Monkey Mania
projects.blurb: The corporate world is under attack! Help the Monkey Master defend the Golden Banana HQ in this pulsating mobile action game.

projects.name: Enhanced Wars - multiplayer, turn-based strategy evolved
projects.blurb: Advance Wars meets Hero Academy in this familiar but fresh take on multiplayer, turn-based strategy games.

projects.name: Kingdom of Knights (Canceled)
projects.blurb: If you like Medieval Video Games, Building Your Own Castles, And Fighting In Large Scale Combat. This Kickstarter is for you!

projects.name: Aterra (Canceled)
projects.blurb: A 3D platform game set in a fantasy environment with a twist of bending gravity. A pleasant cocktail of Planescape, Portal and Thief.

projects.name: AMBROV X: A Story-Driven, Science Fiction RPG (Canceled)
projects.blurb: A story-driven, cross-platform Science Fiction RPG set in the award-winning universe of Sime~Gen.

projects.name: Lawsuit - the law is in your hands (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Live the life of a lawyer in a vast, open world city where you must rise to the top of your game - however you choose to play

projects.name: Maverick Hunters (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Inspired by 16 bit 2D Platformers Maverick Hunters is a Side Scrolling Action / Shooter with a customizable hero.

projects.name: Total Wrestling Promoter  - Wrestling Management Game!
projects.blurb: Wrestling Management game for Android and iOS created by UK Indy Wrestler Jayson Mayson.

projects.name: Battle Isle: Threshold Run (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Threshold Run™ is a turn-based tactics game set against a post-WWII alternate history.

projects.name: The Epidemic (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Multiplayer infected survival sandbox for the p.c

projects.name: Hadron's Forge (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Space exploration, mining, building, RPG sandbox game with an epic story and a dose of real space science. Made by ex-aerospace guys.

projects.name: La Vida: A game about life (Canceled)
projects.blurb: La Vida is a life simulation game in which you control Dudes or Dudettes in the adventure of life, achieving various goals as you make

projects.name: Alteil Horizons (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Online turn-based tactics card game with a battle grid by creators of Star Ocean & Valkyrie Profile. Artists from Zelda & Final Fantasy

projects.name: Cimmerian Space Browser Game (Canceled)
projects.blurb: "Elite for Facebook/Google+" -3D HTML5 space shooter featuring real time combat, trading, bounty hunting and photographic crew members!

projects.name: The Field Hockey Computer Game - PC MAC LINUX PS XBOX OUYA
projects.blurb: The first ever field hockey computer game. For PC, Mac & Linux + XBOX 360 PS4 OUYA iOS Android - Autumn 2014

projects.name: Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest (Puzzle Adventure Game!)
projects.blurb: A creative escape-style puzzle game ! Puzzles are best described as a cross between 7th Guest and Not-Pron ! Try the DEMO if you dare !

projects.name: Paintball Panda: The Bamboo Tales,your new everyday game :)
projects.blurb: Be a part of history with Paintball Panda: The Bamboo Tales. Coming to mobile devices everywhere for your entertainment, Join Us :)

projects.name: NIBELUNGEN SAGA (Canceled)
projects.blurb: The game based on the ancient legend that inspired “Lord of the Rings” and many other fantasy stories.
